name: pinky
longDescription: -l     produce long format output for the specified USERs

options.name: s
options.description: Do short format output, this is the default.

options.name: f
options.description: Omit the line of column headings in short format.

options.name: w
options.description: Omit the user's full name in short format.

options.name: i
options.description: Omit the user's full name and remote host in short format.

options.name: q
options.description: Omit the user's full name, remote host and idle time in short format.

options.name: b
options.description: Omit the user's home directory and shell in long format.

options.name: h
options.description: Omit the user's project file in long format.

options.name: l
options.description: Produce long format output for the specified USERs.

options.name: p
options.description: Omit the user's plan file in long format.
